thread.title: MEGASTAR IS BACK! First Look Posters From Bruce Lee The Fighter
thread.title_full: MEGASTAR IS BACK! First Look Posters From Bruce Lee The Fighter

title: MEGASTAR IS BACK! First Look Posters From Bruce Lee The Fighter
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Published: Thursday, October 15, 2015, 19:14 [IST] 
Bruce Lee The Fighter starring Ram Charan and Rakul Preet Singh is all to hit screens tomorrow and mega fans were are all charged up with the unanimous positive buzz around. 
In addition to that, the newly released first look posters of Megastar Chiranjeevi from the film, boosted the energies of movie goers along with mega fans. 
By now it is a common knowledge that Chiru is playing a 5 minute cameo in Bruce Lee , which comes towards the end of the film to save the hero, who is locked in a dangerous situation. 
Megastar is playing himself in the movie, as informed by the team in several interviews. He was also given few dialogues addressing his fans, which will surely get some hooting and whistling from the masses. 
The father and son duo acted in a horse riding scene in the film and few stills from it were released today on the internet, making fans go crazy. MEGASTAR IS BACK! First Look Posters From Bruce Lee 1/5 — DVV Entertainments (@DVVEnts) October 15, 2015 Chiranjeevi 
Read a tweet from official handle of Bruce Lee makers. MEGASTAR IS BACK! First Look Posters From Bruce Lee 2/5 — DVV Entertainments (@DVVEnts) October 15, 2015 Boss is Back 
Chiru and Charan on horse backs. MEGASTAR IS BACK! First Look Posters From Bruce Lee 3/5 
Here is another unseen still from the film. MEGASTAR IS BACK! First Look Posters From Bruce Lee 4/5 
A video of your favourite Megastar Chiru on the sets of #BruceLeeTheFighter will be up very soon.. The wait is on! #BossIsBack #BruceLeeOnOct16
